scripts.start:colossus:dev:api:debug: env-cmd yarn nx run colossus:build && env-cmd node dist/apps/colossus/main.js
scripts.start:colossus:dev:api:wealth-kernel-con: env-cmd nx run wealth-kernel-connector:build:production && env-cmd node dist/apps/wealth-kernel-connector/main.js
scripts.docker:build:base-image: env-cmd -f .env.docker-build docker build -f apps/colossus/Dockerfile . -t local-colossus-base-image --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --progress plain --target base --cache-from local-colossus-base-image
scripts.docker:build:colossus: npm run docker:build:base-image && env-cmd -f .env.docker-build docker build -f apps/colossus/Dockerfile . -t bambugoacr.azurecr.io/colossus:latest --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --progress plain --cache-from local-colossus-base-image
scripts.docker:build:colossus:bit-bucket: env-cmd -f .env.docker-build docker build -f apps/colossus/bit-bucket.Dockerfile . -t bambugoacr.azurecr.io/colossus:latest-amd64 --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --progress plain
scripts.docker:build:db-setup-image: npm run docker:build:base-image && env-cmd -f .env.docker-build docker build -f apps/colossus/db.setup.slim.Dockerfile . -t bambugoacr.azurecr.io/colossus-db-setup:latest --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --progress plain --cache-from local-colossus-base-image
scripts.docker:build:db-setup-image:bit-bucket: npm run docker:build:base-image && env-cmd -f .env.docker-build docker build -f apps/colossus/bit-bucket.db.setup.Dockerfile . -t bambugoacr.azurecr.io/colossus-db-setup:latest --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --progress plain --cache-from local-colossus-base-image
scripts.docker:build:keycloak:dev: env-cmd -f .env.docker-build docker build -f docker-compose-keycloak.Dockerfile . -t babugoacr.azurecr.io/keycloak:latest --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --progress plain
scripts.docker:build:cron-wealth-kernel-token-re: npm run docker:build:base-image && env-cmd -f .env.docker-build docker build -f apps/cron-jobs/cron-wealth-kernel-token-renewal/Dockerfile . -t bambugoacr.azurecr.io/cron-wk-connector-renew:latest --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --progress plain --cache-from local-colossus-base-image

env-cmd -f .env.docker-build docker build -f apps/cron-jobs/cron-wealth-kernel-token-renewal/Dockerfile . -t cron-wealth-kernel-token-renewal:latest --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --progress plain

scripts.docker:build:cron-wealth-kernel-model-sy: npm run docker:build:base-image && env-cmd -f .env.docker-build docker build -f apps/cron-jobs/cron-syncronize-model-portfolio-wk-models/Dockerfile . -t bambugoacr.azurecr.io/cron-wk-model-sync:latest --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --progress plain --cache-from local-colossus-base-image
